issue.title: [MATLAB] Enable GitHub Actions CI for MATLAB Interface on macOS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15195](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15195). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Enable CI and Testing for MATLAB submissions to the [Apache Arrow project](https://github.com/apache/arrow) on GitHub. This task can be worked on after [MATLAB Actions](https://github.com/matlab-actions/setup-matlab) is enabled on macOS.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15195?focusedCommentId=17489121) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12342
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12342>
